activities: Support.com delivers consumer technology support services using software developed by Support.com.  These services may be delivered by Support.com or by its contractors and business partners.  In this context, Support.com receives and maintains information voluntarily provided by customers, including name, address, phone number, e-mail address, password, and payment card information.  Support.com also collects personal information from its employees and candidates as a part of its human resources programs.
corpofftitle1: SVP Business Affairs, General Counsel & Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: Support.com commits to BBB's EU Safe Harbor Program as its dispute resolution mechanism.
